text.headline: First Event
text.text: Description of the first event in the timeline. Add details about what happened and why it matters.

events.notes: Additional context or notes that appear in tooltips and the details panel.

text.headline: Second Event
text.text: Description of the second event. Events without month/day default to January 1st.

text.headline: Third Event
text.text: Description of the third event. Events with only year and month default to the 1st of that month.

text.headline: Fourth Event
text.text: Description of the fourth event with full date precision.

text.headline: Fifth Event
text.text: Description of the fifth event marking a significant milestone.

events.notes: Impact and relevance of this event.

text.headline: Sixth Event
text.text: Description of the sixth event with modern significance.

text.headline: Seventh Event
text.text: Description of the seventh event representing recent developments.

text.headline: Eighth Event
text.text: Description of the eighth and final template event.
